sect2.title: Snap to Guides
sect2.para: The Snap to Guides command enables and disables snap to guides. When snap to guides is enabled, the guides you set (see Show Guides) almost seems magnetic; when you move a layer or selection, the guides appear to pull on it when it approaches. This is enormously useful for accurate placement of image elements.

listitem.para:
You can access this command from the image menubar through
View Snap to Guides .
